main.name: Luk on Cloud

main.description: Fullstack developer focus on Node.js, Express.js, MERN, AWS, GCP! Laisse-moi un courriel, je te répondrai plus tard
main.bio: Hi, this is Luk from Ottawa. I am a trilingual database engineer fullstacker and on the way to be cloud architect.
main.contactmessage: Laisse-moi un courriel, je te répondrai plus tard. Don't worry, just drop me a message and i will reply later.

projects.title: MERN Stack Google book search engine
projects.category: This application allows user to search google books using Google Books API. User has the option to view the book on Google or save the book to view it sometime later. (Heroku, MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Salut mon gars. I am very proud of what you have achieved so far. thanks for helping us with free accessible tools.

testimonials.text: Hello Luk, thanks for you hard work and commitment. We highly appreciate your work and value that you have demonstrated throughout your work.
